petTests

Class MockPet

  • java.lang.Object
    • pets.Pet
      • petTests.MockPet

  • public class MockPet
extends Pet
    Class to allow us to create pet objects for our JUint tests as Pet is an abstract class.

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      private static int petHappinessChange
      The amount a pet's happiness decreases per day
      private static int petHealthChange
      The rate at which a pet's health changes
      private static int petHungerPerDay
      Rate of change of the pet's hunger
      private static float petMeanWeight
      Weight range of the mock pet, it's weight will be set to a random value within 20% of this value by the super constructor.
      private static int petRoughness
      How roughly the pet plays with its toys
      private static java.lang.String petSpecies
      Species of the mock pet
      private static int petTirednessChange
      The rate at which a pet's tiredness changes
      private static int petToiletPerDay
      Rate of change of the pet's toilet need

      Constructor and Description
      MockPet(java.lang.String petName, Player petOwner)
      Constructor for the class.
      MockPet(java.lang.String petName, Player petOwner, int seed)
      Constructor allowing a seed to be passed in for testing of methods involving random number generation.

    • Constructor Detail

      • MockPet

        public MockPet(java.lang.String petName,
               Player petOwner)
        Constructor for the class. Calls the super constructor to initialise its attributes.
        Parameters:
        petName - The name of the Mock Pet.
        petOwner - The Mock Pet's owner.

      • MockPet

        public MockPet(java.lang.String petName,
               Player petOwner,
               int seed)
        Constructor allowing a seed to be passed in for testing of methods involving random number generation.
        Parameters:
        petName - The name of the Mock Pet.
        petOwner - The owner of the Mock Pet.
        seed - The seed to be fed into the Random object created in the super constructor.
